document_data.name: Belt of the Many Arrows
document_data.creator: [[Many-Arrows]] [[orcs]]
document_data.mainbody: A '''belt of the Many Arrows''' was a distinctive [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[belt]] awarded to the fiercest warriors among the [[Many-Arrows]] [[orcs]].
document_data.Description: The belts were decorated with the traditional totems of the Many-Arrows tribe, and served as markers of power and status. Some belts were customized by their wearer.
document_data.Powers: These belts enhanced their wearers' durability in battle.
document_data.History: During the mid-to-late 15{{Th}} century [[DR]], orcs who had earned the honor to wear these belts were known to lead warbands in the ruined [[Neverwinter/River District|Tower District]] of [[Neverwinter]]. This included the Many-Arrows' vicious taskmasters, who [[whip]]ped lower ranking orcs into frenzies before sending them at the [[Neverwinter Guard]].
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Kragmar Deepscar]] wore a unique ''Belt of the Many Arrows'' while he led an orc warband in Neverwinter.
